subject: Steroids
Football
Baseball
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: While federal prosecutors seem preoccupied with toppling Barry Bonds, the National Football League is allowing a star to march back into competition, relatively unscathed. Where is the outrage?
snippet: While federal prosecutors seem preoccupied with toppling Barry Bonds, the National Football League is allowing a star to march back into competition, relatively unscathed. Where is the outrage?
